Translations.Text: Ili challenge vi bring doom them rather than torn righteous! Sufficient precedents set them en des preter. Ja your Lord est plen da forgiveness popol their transgressions your Lord est ankaux strict en enforcing retribution
Those disbelieved dir nur mirakl ven him his Lord (ni tiam kred.) Vi est simply warner - Cxiu community ricev direkt teacher
DI kon KI CXIU female URS KI CXIU womb releases GAJN! Cxio Li does perfectly mezur
Knower de all sekret declarations; Supreme plej Alt
est des sam vi conceal your thoughts deklar them kasx darkness nokt akt daylight

(Shifts angxel) sorb rest each unu de vi - Ili est vi behind vi. Ili rest vi gard vi en accordance kun di ordon! Tiel DI ne sxangx stat any popol ili far decision sxangx. Di vol any hardship any popol ne force stop gxi. Por ili hav neniom Him as Lord kaj Mastr
Li est Unu montr vi fulm source tim ankaux as esper Li iniciat loaded nub
Tondr lauxd His glory kaj tial do angxel reverence por Him. Li send fulm bolts which traf en accordance kun His vol. Ili argue DI kvankam His potenc est awesome
